Let x be the age of my brother.
I am 3 years younger than my brother, so I am x - 3 years old.
My sister is 2 years younger than I am, so she is x - 3 - 2 = x - 5 years old.
My mom's age is one less than three times my brother's age, so she is 3x - 1.
When you add all our ages, you get 87, so x + (x - 3) + (x - 5) + (3x - 1) = 87.
This simplifies to 7x - 9 = 87.
Adding 9 to both sides, you get 7x = 96.
Dividing both sides by 7, you get x = 14.
Since I am 3 years younger than my brother, I am 14 - 3 = <<14-3=11>>11 years old.
